title: Fix the logout bug
author: devuser
content:
Repository: gathertown/corporate-context
Pull Request: #202 - Fix the logout bug
URL: https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/202
Status: merged
Author: devuser

Description:
This resolves EXP-166.

The issue was caused by a race condition in the session validation middleware where concurrent requests could invalidate each other's sessions.

Changes:
- Added mutex lock around session validation
- Improved session storage to handle concurrent access
- Added regression tests
